amendment.description: Page 426, after line 6, insert the following new section: SEC. 1004. REPORT ON AUDITABLE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. Not later than 30 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Defense shall submit to the congressional defense committees a report ranking all military departments and Defense Agencies in order of how advanced they are in achieving auditable financial statements as required by law. The report should not include information otherwise available in other reports to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 83 printed in House Report 114-112 to require a report ranking all military departments and Defense Agencies in order of how advanced they are in achieving auditable financial statements as required by law.
